message:
A failure occurred when running migrations for {{repo_name.name}}:{{environment.name}}. 

**What happened:** This alert indicates that [the db:migrate task](https://github.com/joinhandshake/handshake-deployer/blob/420b757e7754e7b29345b8cf125eab67a6e328eb/kube-deploy.rb#L51) executed by the deployer failed to run for some reason.  

**What to do:** 
1. You should [lock deploys](https://deployer.handshake-deploy.com/locks) to prevent further complications.
2. You should view the logs for the failed deployment in the [deployer UI ](https://deployer.handshake-deploy.com). The event that triggered this should contain a link to the failed deployment.
3. Fix the failed migration.
4. Unlock and resume deployments.
 @slack-incidents
name: Deployer migrations failed to run.
query: events("source:my_apps status:error \"sources:handshake-deployer Deployer migrations failed to run.\"").rollup("count").by("repo_name,environment").last("1h") >= 1
